items.text: short ball in the corridor, tapped back to the bowler off the back foot
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: mistimed pull as he looks to drag this from outside off. Short ball slanted across him is too quick for him
items.shortText: Cottrell to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, pushed with soft hands into the off side and another single is stolen
items.shortText: Cottrell to Anamul Haque, 1 run

items.text: length ball on leg stump, flicked to short fine's left
items.postText: slips out again. Thrice today and he's into his fifth over. Another one ends up behind him as he looks to deliver this
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: thuds the back leg as he looks to pull. Short of a length ball on leg stump and he's looking to go towards fine leg with this
items.shortText: Cottrell to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: length outside off, defended into the covers
items.shortText: Cottrell to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: length outside off, looks to push another one into the off side with soft hands. Can't get it off the pitch
items.shortText: Cottrell to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: length on off stump, gets forward and flicks to short midwicket
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full ball just outside off, steps out and yorks himself. Manages to squeeze it to mid-off's right
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: taken at mid-on. Anamul's struggle ends. It's a a short ball rising steeply in the corridor and an ordinary attempt to hook. He's caught on the front foot and is completely cramped. Drags it into the hands of mid-on off the high part of the bat
items.shortText: Holder to Anamul Haque, OUT

dismissal.text: Anamul Haque c KOA Powell b Holder 10 (31b 1x4 0x6) SR: 32.25

items.text: full on middle stump, flicks to deep square's right
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: slower ball, full at middle stump. Has to check and tap with soft hands after shaping to flick
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length in the corridor, pushed to point off the front foot
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of a length and coming in at leg stump. Gets on the back foot and glances to short fine
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short of a length skidder hurries him in the corridor. Gets back and taps to short cover
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short of a length on leg stump, whipped to deep backward square
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: short of a length slider outside off, punched down the pitch off the back foot
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, clipped to midwicket's left
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length outside off, blocked on the front foot
items.postText: Raj: "Here we go again! Another final, another slow innings from an opening batsman. Reminds me of nazimuddins 52 ball 16runs innings in the asia cup final against pakistan."
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Holder around the wicket. Really troubled Shakib with this angle in the Tests.
items.text: pings him on the thumb with one that climbs up from a length. He's looking to flick this as it comes into him
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: glorious. Offers the full face this time. Length ball skidding in with the angle and he puts a stride forward to lift it straight over the bowler
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: short of a length at off stump, can't get this late cut past point and gully
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: nicely played again, but mid-off's dive will keep it to one. It's a length ball outside off and he gets a full swing through as he drives on the up. Powell leaps to his right and saves
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: now Keemo Paul to his right, pulls off a stunning save. Tamim walks across into the off side and pulls powerfully to deep square's right. Keemo sprints and stops it very late
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: steps out against a bounce that's outside off, he can't get bat on that
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide
